item.title: 10 armies of Mara
item.description: (Satan, not necessarily a personal entity, but the forces of negativity that can arise and tempt us from not obtaining enlightenment):

item.title: 2 Extreme Views of Being
item.description: 2 kinds of extreme views in regard to existence: Everything exists Everything does not exist (from Samyutta Nikaya 12.

item.title: 2 Extreme Views of practice
item.description: 2 kinds of extreme views: That the precepts and doctrine are the essence of the training That there is no harm in indulgence in sense pleasures (from Samyutta Nikaya 12.
